snippet.title: Super Mario: Blue Twilight DX
snippet.description:
This is a game I made. The video here is really, really old. Like, April 2004 old. It shows incomplete versions of a LOT of the levels an bosses, so rest assured, the final product is a lot more polished. 

Super Mario: Blue Twilight DX is a non-profit fangame based on the Super Mario series by Nintendo. It was released on July 30th, 2005 - but due to frequent quick-fix patches, most consider its release date to really be August 1st, 2005. The game is a 2D platform game, though it also combines elements from 3D games such as Super Mario 64.

On the week of August 6, 2005, Blue Twilight won the "Game of the Week" award at The Daily Click by a landslide. On August 19th, 2005, it was also featured on G4's Attack of the Show, for Free Play Friday. To date, it has had over 250,000 downloads total between the two versions (1.03 and 1.04), and has been featured in many magazines and websites such as GamesMaster, InsertCredit, Kotaku, Digg, and more.

For more information, see this:

http://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb&param=02&c=2&id=1963


PATREON ------ http://www.patreon.com/blazehedgehog
